summary: Since Vladr\'s Lucky Dagger works with the Elemental Fury shout, I thought Mehrunes Razor should too.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first (released) mod. Only one I think people would actually use.

I have not done much testing yet. I had the dagger already upon creating this mod. Please let me know if I have negatively affected the quest to receive it or anything else you find.

What led to this mod: Left hand Vladr\'s Lucky Dagger + right hand Stamina Absorb enchanted mace + Dual Flurry perk (One-Handed Weapons tree) + power attacks = Near infinite berserk slaughter.

However Mehrunes Razor is just so cool, I wanted to be able to use this combo with the Razor so here is a mod that enables one to do so.

INSTRUCTIONS: 1. Unzip 2. Place .esp file into your Skyrim\\Data folder. 3. Load it up and slash away!
author: Vladgina
